headline.main: KNOX WOULD STOP HYPOCRISY IN LAW; Secretary Tells Detroit Navy Day Audience Neutrality Act Hampers Policy

lead_paragraph: DETROIT, Oct. 27 -- Complete repeal of the Neutrality Act was urged today by Frank Knox, Secretary of the Navy, in a speech made at a "Navy and Total Defense Day luncheon" here today.
abstract: repeal urged by Knox, Navy Day s
snippet: DETROIT, Oct. 27 -- Complete repeal of the Neutrality Act was urged today by Frank Knox, Secretary of the Navy, in a speech made at a "Navy and Total Defense Day luncheon" here today....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
